name: morrislaptop/laravel-five-package-bridges
description: Use your Laravel 4 packages in Laravel 5

suggest.way/generators: Rapidly speed up your Laravel workflow with generators https://packagist.org/packages/way/generators
suggest.maatwebsite/excel: An eloquent way of importing and exporting Excel and CSV files for Laravel with the power of PHPExcel http://www.maatwebsite.nl/laravel-excel/docs
suggest.itsgoingd/clockwork: Server-side component of Clockwork, a Chrome extension for PHP development.
suggest.cartalyst/sentry: A framework agnostic authentication & authorization system. http://www.cartalyst.com
suggest.camroncade/timezone: Addon to assist with Timezone managemenr
